triples.name: Rough set
triples.relevance: Foundational framework for handling uncertain and incomplete data using approximation theory.

triples.name: Dominance-based rough set approach
triples.relevance: Classical approach that the paper extends to interval-valued ordered decision systems.

triples.name: Feature selection
triples.relevance: Novel feature selection algorithm for interval-valued ordered decision systems is the paper's main contribution.

triples.name: List of datasets for machine-learning research
triples.relevance: The UCI Machine Learning Repository datasets are used for experimental validation.

triples.name: Decision tree learning
triples.relevance: Related to decision systems and rule induction techniques used in the analysis.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Broader field encompassing knowledge discovery from ordered decision systems.
